Literature.Title: Effects of single amino acid substitution on the biophysical properties and biological activities of an amphipathic ?-helical antibacterial peptide against Gram-negative bacteria.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H188(MIC=8µg/ml)
